member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_DEP_POLICY
member.summary: Contains process mitigation policy settings for data execution prevention (DEP). The and functions use this structure.

member.name: PROCESS_MITIGATION_DEP_POLICY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Flags
member.summary: This member is reserved for system use.

summary.para: DEP is permanently enabled and cannot be disabled if this field is set to TRUE.
ATL thunk emulation is disabled for the process if this flag is set.
DEP is enabled for the process if this flag is set.
This member is reserved for system use.
